Title: Unveiling developers contributions behind code commits: an exploratory study
Published: Proceedings of the 29th Annual ACM Symposium on Applied Computing
Elements_risk_assessment: The lines changed in the fix commit could be not the real BIC
Summary: It is an empirical study to assess and compare the contributions of the developers through software repository mining.
Outcome: It show significant differences in the contribution provided by the developers groups considering the open-source and the commercial project
